thumb.title: ナキボクロ『からっぽの太陽』【Official Music Video】
thumb.description: More information for Nakibokuro 🔻https://linktr.ee/Nakibokuro【Music Video STAFF】Direction : Jun Matsuda (TWO WAIDEE)Illustration/Animation: hanaComposite:Saki Watanabe (TWO WAIDEE)Logo Design:Seita Takahashi / Ikumi Matsumura (FUETE)【about Music】Lyricist&Composer : WEST GROUND / Naoki ItoArranger : WEST GROUND / Naoki ItoREC&MIX : Toshiyuki Kawahito (VICTOR STUDIO)REC STUDIO：VICTOR STUDIO
